pullRequest.title: Fix move console left/right command
pullRequest.bodyText:
Without this, the View / Panes / Console on Left (or Right) commands didn't change anything until you reloaded the UI.
Fixes #7405
(Was also dependent on fix made in v1.3, #7399)

commit.message:
Fix move console left/right command

Without this, the View / Panes / Console on Left (or Right) commands didn't change anything until you reloaded the UI.

Fixes #7405

nodes.bodyText: Looking into it, we don't seem to ever fire UpdateTabPanelsEvent so I think we should get rid of this handler and the event.

I know you didn't write the original code, but do you know why the comparisons between windows A & B are compared with && as opposed to ||? It seems like as long as one is different we want to do the replace.

commit.message:
Review feedback

- The UpdateTabPanelsEvent is never fired, so remove it and that unwinds the need to add a flag to DualWindowLayoutPanel.replaceWindows
